Parameter of the motor configurationout of permissible rangeParameter _SigLatched Bit 16

System error detected: Invalidencoder parameterParameter _SigLatched Bit 16

Description: Timeout reading the absoluteposition from the encoderParameter _SigLatched Bit 16
Cause: Communication channel (Hiperface)to encoder is subject to interferenceor motor encoder is inoperative.
